_sText:
Ts sneak into a under water experiment base to plant a bomb, CTs get a tip off of this and go down into the base to wait for the Ts, but they are waiting in the wrong place. Then there is an accident and its a race to the top for survival, but with rising water it makes the race a deadly one.

Cant give you any more screenshots because they will tell you to much about whats up ahead.
